messages.title: Labour invests in NHS health care
messages.content: We are proud of our record on NHS investment. Hospital waiting lists are at an all-time low and GPs now offer extended opening hours. Our future plans include guarantees on cancer referrals within two weeks and hospital treatment within 18 weeks.

messages.title: Labour delivers on education
messages.content: Labour has invested heavily in education. Over the last thirteen years there have been 4000 schools built or remodelled, 42,400 more teachers, more support staff and the introduction of the popular Sure Start service. Our future plans include guarantee of training places for young people.

messages.title: Labour protects jobs
messages.content: Labour has protected jobs during global recession. Cuts in tax for 22 million people and VAT have helped families and businesses. The impact on employment and responsiveness has been much less than in previous Tory plans would put this recovery at risk.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans include guarantees on cancer referrals within two weeks and hospital treatment within 18 weeks, aiming for lower hospital waiting lists and extended GP opening hours.

Investment in the past 13 years with 4000 schools built or remodelled, an increase in teachers, more support staff, and the Sure Start service, with a promise to guarantee training places for young people.
Protected jobs during global recession with tax cuts for 22 million people and reduced VAT; aims to continue policies to support families, businesses, and employment.

leaflet.personalStatement: If elected I will work tirelessly on behalf of the whole community and not just the privileged few. The voters in Horsham deserve a full-time MP who will stand up for you in parliament.

contactInformation.address: 10 Clarence Road, Horsham, West Sussex RH13 5SQ

images.caption: Labour invests in NHS health care
